articles.description: In the second of the Guardian’s onstage interviews from the festival, Rebecca Lucy Taylor reflects on her journey from one half of indie outfit Slow Club to red-hot pop phenomenon
articles.content: For Self Esteem AKA Rebecca Lucy Taylor Glastonbury is where it all began, sort of. It was Gary Lightbody! she told Alexis Petridis in the second of the Guardians onstage interviews with musicians on… [+4922 chars]

articles.title: BBC iPlayer - Glastonbury - Paul McCartney - BBC
articles.description: Paul McCartney's headline set on the Pyramid Stage.
articles.content: The living legend that is Sir Paul McCartney, returns to headline Glastonbury for a second time, a week after celebrating his eightieth birthday. More
